org.gradle.api.artifacts.repositories

Interface RepositoryLayout

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IvyPatternRepositoryLayout

    public interface RepositoryLayout
    Represents the directory structure for a repository. For examples see the reference for IvyArtifactRepository.layout(String, org.gradle.api.Action)
    Since:
    2.3 (feature was already present in Groovy DSL, this type introduced in 2.3)
